Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to amending the authorization for the imposition of additional sales and compensating use tax in Herkimer county
Summary: Relates to the authorization for the imposition of additional sales and compensating use tax in Herkimer county.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the period during which the county of Herkimer is authorized to impose additional sales and compensating use taxes
